articles.description: Some of the moments you may have missed from Everton's 1-0 win at West Brom
articles.content:
Pickford's point of view
 For around the first hour of the game, and in parts after Richarlison had scored, Jordan Pickford was offering the best analysis of Everton 's performance you could find. … [+2404 chars]
